text.summary: Spend experience to gain or upgrade assets.
text.trigger: When you have enough experience (typically 2 XP) and take time to train, acquire a new asset or mark an ability on an existing one.

outcomes.strongHit: Spend the XP to gain the asset or ability. No roll is made for this move.
outcomes.weakHit: Spend the XP to gain the asset or ability. No roll is made for this move.
outcomes.miss: Spend the XP to gain the asset or ability. No roll is made for this move.

text.summary: Support another PC's move.
text.trigger: When you Secure an Advantage or Compel on behalf of an ally to set them up, roll using the appropriate stat.

outcomes.strongHit: Your ally takes +2 on their next move and you take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: Your ally takes +1 on their next move but you are exposed to danger or cost.
outcomes.miss: Your aid backfires or puts you both in trouble. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Get a prompt or answer from the oracle tables.
text.trigger: When you are unsure of the outcome or need inspiration, choose your method (yes/no with odds, pick a table, or roll twice for action/theme) and consult the oracle.

outcomes.strongHit: Use the oracle result to guide the fiction. No roll is made for this move.
outcomes.weakHit: Use the oracle result to guide the fiction. No roll is made for this move.
outcomes.miss: Use the oracle result to guide the fiction. No roll is made for this move.

text.summary: Resolve a decisive battle in one move.
text.trigger: When you fight a chaotic battle and it cannot be broken into smaller exchanges, choose your approach and roll.

outcomes.strongHit: The battle ends in your favor. Choose two: inflict savage harm, suffer little harm, take +2 momentum, take +1 spirit.
outcomes.weakHit: The battle ends, but choose one benefit above and also endure a cost or complication.
outcomes.miss: You are routed or overwhelmed. Pay the Price and the battle continues against you.

text.summary: Trade blows when you do not have initiative.
text.trigger: When you exchange strikes with the foe while they have the initiative, roll +iron in close quarters or +edge at range.

outcomes.strongHit: You inflict harm and gain +1 momentum. You retain initiative.
outcomes.weakHit: You inflict harm but also endure harm or a negative effect. Initiative stays with the foe.
outcomes.miss: You are outmatched. Endure Harm or suffer a dire cost. Initiative stays with the foe.

text.summary: Leverage a companion's help when an ability provides assistance.
text.trigger: When a companion's ability says it aids your action, apply the listed bonus to your next move.

outcomes.strongHit: Take the companion's bonus (often +1 or +1 harm) on your next appropriate move.
outcomes.weakHit: Take the bonus but also mark a minor cost such as -1 momentum or companion health -1 if noted.
outcomes.miss: The companion's aid falters. Pay the Price or mark companion harm if appropriate.

text.summary: See how a companion weathers harm.
text.trigger: When your companion faces harm, roll +companion's health.

outcomes.strongHit: Your companion rallies; take +1 momentum or +1 companion health (max at its rating).
outcomes.weakHit: Your companion is battered. Choose one: companion health -1 or you take -1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: Your companion is out of action or destroyed; Pay the Price and set companion health to 0.

text.summary: Persuade, threaten, or lie to someone.
text.trigger: When you try to convince, charm, coerce, or trick someone, roll +heart, or +iron if threatening, or +shadow if lying or bluffing.

outcomes.strongHit: They do what you want or share what you need. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: They will do it, but only if you promise something in return or accept a cost.
outcomes.miss: They refuse, counter, or make a demand. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Resolve the fight when you think victory is at hand.
text.trigger: When you have the foe at a disadvantage and want to resolve the combat, roll the fight's progress against the challenge dice.

outcomes.strongHit: The fight ends decisively. Choose two: take +1 momentum, take +1 spirit, avoid harm/complication, or mark a clear victory toward your objective.
outcomes.weakHit: The fight ends, but choose one benefit above and also accept a cost or complication.
outcomes.miss: The foe endures or strikes back. Pay the Price and the fight continues or turns against you.

text.summary: Absorb physical injury.
text.trigger: When you face physical damage, roll +health. If your health is 0, roll +iron instead.

outcomes.strongHit: Shake it off. Choose one: take +1 momentum or +1 health.
outcomes.weakHit: Press on. Take -1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: The harm is worse than it seemed. Suffer an additional -1 health or Face Death if at 0 health.

text.summary: Withstand fear, loss, or mental strain.
text.trigger: When you face mental shock, loneliness, or horror, roll +spirit. If your spirit is 0, roll +heart instead.

outcomes.strongHit: You steel yourself. Choose one: take +1 momentum or +1 spirit.
outcomes.weakHit: Press on. Take -1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: Your resolve falters. Suffer an additional -1 spirit or Face Despair if at 0 spirit.

text.summary: Establish initiative at the start of a fight.
text.trigger: When you initiate combat or are forced into it, choose your approach and roll (+edge on the move, +heart to stand with allies or show courage, +iron up close, +shadow to ambush, +wits to use a plan).

outcomes.strongHit: Take +2 momentum and gain initiative.
outcomes.weakHit: You gain initiative but choose one: take +1 momentum or face a small complication.
outcomes.miss: Your foe has initiative. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Act under fire or risk.
text.trigger: When you attempt something risky or react to an imminent threat, roll with the stat that matches your approach.

outcomes.strongHit: You succeed. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: You succeed but face a troublesome cost or complication.
outcomes.miss: You fail or a new danger is revealed. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Confront mortality when grievously wounded or doomed.
text.trigger: When you suffer a lethal blow or face certain death, roll +heart.

outcomes.strongHit: You cling to life. Take +1 momentum and remain alive.
outcomes.weakHit: You survive but at a great cost: endure a permanent burden, mark a debility, or Pay the Price.
outcomes.miss: Death takes you, or you are lost beyond recovery.

text.summary: Confront hopelessness when your spirit is broken.
text.trigger: When your spirit is 0 and you cannot continue, roll +heart.

outcomes.strongHit: You find resolve. Take +1 spirit and +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: You push through. Take +1 spirit but also take -1 momentum or mark a mental debility.
outcomes.miss: You succumb to despair. You cannot progress until hope is restored; Pay the Price.

text.summary: Earn a lasting connection.
text.trigger: When you spend significant time helping a person or community and prove your loyalty, roll +heart.

outcomes.strongHit: You earn the bond. Mark the bond progress and take +1 spirit.
outcomes.weakHit: You are granted the bond but must swear a vow or make a promise to honor it.
outcomes.miss: Your attempt is rejected or exposes a misunderstanding. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Abandon a sworn quest.
text.trigger: When you renounce or cannot complete a vow, act to forsake it.

outcomes.strongHit: Clear all progress on the vow and Endure Stress at -2. No roll is made for this move.
outcomes.weakHit: Clear all progress on the vow and Endure Stress at -2. No roll is made for this move.
outcomes.miss: Clear all progress on the vow and Endure Stress at -2. No roll is made for this move.

text.summary: Resolve a vow using its progress track.
text.trigger: When you believe you have completed a vow, roll the vow's progress against the challenge dice.

outcomes.strongHit: Your vow is fulfilled. Mark experience per rank (1/2/3/4/5).
outcomes.weakHit: Your vow is fulfilled, but there is more to do or a complication arises. Mark the experience and Pay the Price.
outcomes.miss: You have been false or the goal eludes you. Pay the Price and your quest is undone.

text.summary: Ask questions, study, or follow clues.
text.trigger: When you search, investigate, or ask questions, roll +wits. If you investigate secretly, roll +shadow.

outcomes.strongHit: You discover something helpful and specific. Take +2 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: The information complicates your quest or introduces new danger. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: Your investigation reveals a dire threat or false lead. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Treat injuries for yourself, an ally, or a companion.
text.trigger: When you tend wounds or stabilize an ally/companion, roll +wits. If you treat your own serious injury, roll +iron.

outcomes.strongHit: Choose two: take +2 health (yourself, ally, or companion), take +1 spirit, take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: Choose one of the above, and Sacrifice Resources (supply -1).
outcomes.miss: The care is ineffective or harmful. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Rest and recover in the wilds.
text.trigger: When you rest and consume resources in a dangerous area, roll +supply.

outcomes.strongHit: Choose two: recover +1 health, +1 spirit, or +1 momentum; take +1 supply; or prepare by taking +1 on your next Undertake a Journey or Resupply.
outcomes.weakHit: Choose one benefit above and take -1 supply.
outcomes.miss: Your rest is cut short or threatened. Pay the Price and take -1 supply.

text.summary: Recover hope after facing despair.
text.trigger: When meaningful comfort, victory, or fellowship offers you hope after despair, roll +heart.

outcomes.strongHit: Cast off despair. Clear the impact, set spirit to 1, and take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: You rise slowly. Set spirit to 1 but take -1 momentum or mark a temporary cost.
outcomes.miss: Hope slips away. Pay the Price and remain in despair.

text.summary: Resolve the cost of a miss or complication.
text.trigger: When a move results in a cost or hardship, envision the most obvious negative outcome. If unsure, roll on the Pay the Price table or Ask the Oracle.

outcomes.strongHit: Apply the consequence the situation demands. No roll is made for this move unless using the oracle table.
outcomes.weakHit: Apply the consequence the situation demands. No roll is made for this move unless using the oracle table.
outcomes.miss: Apply the consequence the situation demands. No roll is made for this move unless using the oracle table.

text.summary: Mark progress on a vow when you make meaningful headway.
text.trigger: When you take a significant step toward fulfilling a vow, mark progress on that vow track per its rank.

outcomes.strongHit: Mark the progress. No roll is made.
outcomes.weakHit: Mark the progress. No roll is made.
outcomes.miss: Mark the progress. No roll is made.

text.summary: Finish a journey using its progress track.
text.trigger: When your journey progress suggests you have arrived, roll the journey's progress against the challenge dice.

outcomes.strongHit: You reach the destination. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: You arrive but face a complication, cost, or delay. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: You are waylaid or arrive to find trouble. Pay the Price and remain on the road.

text.summary: Obtain needed supplies.
text.trigger: When you hunt, forage, barter, or steal to bolster your supply, roll +wits (scavenge/forage), +edge (raid or stealth), or +heart (barter or negotiate).

outcomes.strongHit: Take +2 supply, or take +1 supply and +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: Take +1 supply but face a cost, complication, or new danger.
outcomes.miss: Your search goes badly. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Prepare or gain leverage.
text.trigger: When you assess a situation, make preparations, or attempt to gain leverage, roll with the stat that fits your approach.

outcomes.strongHit: Take +2 momentum or +1 on your next move (one ally may take this instead).
outcomes.weakHit: Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: Your attempt backfires or reveals a danger. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Recover and seek aid in a community.
text.trigger: When you spend time in a community seeking recovery, comfort, or aid, roll +heart (add +1 if you share a bond).

outcomes.strongHit: Choose two recover actions (such as heal +2, spirit +2, supply +2, take +2 momentum, or provision allies). Each chosen action costs -1 supply unless the community helps.
outcomes.weakHit: Choose one recover action above, and take +1 momentum. Any aid comes with a condition or cost.
outcomes.miss: Your stay is cut short or tense. Pay the Price.

text.summary: Attack when you have initiative.
text.trigger: When you attack a foe while you have initiative, roll +iron in close combat or +edge at range.

outcomes.strongHit: Inflict harm and take +1 momentum. You retain initiative.
outcomes.weakHit: Inflict harm, but lose initiative or face a counter.
outcomes.miss: Your attack fails or you are countered. Pay the Price and lose initiative.

text.summary: Commit to a quest with ironclad intent.
text.trigger: When you swear to complete a quest, roll +heart. If you share a bond with the beneficiary, add +1.

outcomes.strongHit: You are sworn and true. Take +2 momentum and begin a progress track per the vow's rank.
outcomes.weakHit: You are determined, but they ask something of you or reveal a complication. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: Your vow is ill-fated. Pay the Price and face a dire warning or immediate hardship.

text.summary: Call on a bond for support or favor.
text.trigger: When your bond is tested or you ask a bonded ally/community for help, roll +heart.

outcomes.strongHit: The bond holds. Choose one: take +2 momentum or +1 spirit.
outcomes.weakHit: They grant aid but with a demand or complication.
outcomes.miss: The bond is broken or denied. Erase the bond and Pay the Price.

text.summary: Seize a final chance in a fight.
text.trigger: Once per fight, after you miss or have initiative against you, you may act decisively: take +1 momentum, gain initiative, and make a move (not a progress move) with +1.

outcomes.strongHit: Apply the bonus to your next move. If that move hits, keep initiative.
outcomes.weakHit: Apply the bonus, but if that move is a weak hit, you lose initiative after resolving it.
outcomes.miss: Apply the bonus, but if that move misses, a dire cost is imposed in addition to the miss.

text.summary: Travel through peril toward a destination.
text.trigger: When you set out across hazardous lands, roll +edge (on the move), +wits (using knowledge), or +heart (guided by a fellow traveler).

outcomes.strongHit: Mark progress and take +1 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: Mark progress, but suffer -1 supply.
outcomes.miss: You face a hardship or peril. Pay the Price and mark progress.
